title: Sword-wall (4R84)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish or Regroup: Spot 3 Elf companions to liberate a site or exert a minion.
Lore:	A fixed line of Elven blades can hold off great numbers of the Enemy's hordes.
Rarity:	R
